info.name: RecipeDB API Endpoint Playground
info.description:
This is a comprehensive documentation for all the API Endpoints of RecipeDB2 for accessing over 118,000 recipes, nutritional data, and meal planning features.

The documentation features example usage (with optional and required parameters) as well as example responses. For achieving a valid response for any API endpoint, the user is required to undergo authorization through an API key, which can be obtained at your Profile dashboard at [Foodoscope](https://www.foodoscope.com/).

You may also use the frontend variant of the RecipeDB API Endpoint Playground at [Foodoscope](https://www.foodoscope.com/) if you wish to, or directly try the API endpoints in cURL (or your desired terminal). The following is an example:

```
curl -X GET "http://cosylab.iiitd.edu/recipe2-api/recipe/recipeofday" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <yourAPIkey>" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json"
Note: Enter your API key without the "Bearer" prefix. This will be automatically added to the request header.

 ```

For a detailed look at all the API endpoints and their parameters, please refer to the GET and POST methods below.

query.description:
Filter by page number.
**Default:** `1`
**Min Value:** `1`
**Max Value:** `Unlimited`

Number of recipes to be shown per page.

**Default:** `10`
**Min Value:** `1`
**Max Value:** `Unlimited`

response.name: Recipe Info
